bibl.title: Some Ancient Egyptian Aspects of Hellenistic Cults at Athribis.
50 Years of Polish Excavations in Egypt and the Near East. Acts of the Symposium at the Warsaw University 1986
bibl.author: MYSLIWIEC, Karol

bibl.note: The occurrence of both Greek and Egyptian deities (Aphrodite, Bes, Harpocrates, Athena) illustrates a peaceful assimilation of ancient Egyptian traditions by Greeks living in Ptolemaic Athribis.
MYSLIWIEC Karol, Some Ancient Egyptian Aspects of Hellenistic Cults at Athribis.
50 Years of Polish Excavations in Egypt and the Near East. Acts of the Symposium at the Warsaw University 1986 (Varsovie, 1992) pp. 260-265, 13 figg.
